title: Best Artificial Intelligence Stocks To Keep An Eye On – January 22nd
description: BigBear.ai, Tempus AI, Hut 8, SoundHound AI, Fluence Energy, Rezolve AI, and SentinelOne are the seven Artificial Intelligence stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool. title: Google acquires Common Sense Machines, whose AI models create 3D assets from 2D images, and was last valued at $15M after raising $10M from a16z and others

title: The New Reality of Business Protection When Data, AI, and Risk Collide
description: Businesses used to think of protection as locks on doors, alarms on windows, and maybe a decent insurance policy. That mindset is gone. Today, the most valuable assets often never sit in a warehouse or office at all. They live in systems, models, networks, and datasets that move at digital speed and attract constant attention [...]The post The New Reality of Business Protection When Data, AI, and Risk Collide appeared first on TechBullion.

title: AI 'must not replace teachers in Scottish schools': Union's manifesto call ahead of 2026 Holyrood election
description: The EIS teaching union has made a raft of demands in its manifesto ahead of the Holyrood election from AI use to college funding
